mdRecord.dcterms:title: Letter, Abba Little to Susan Pellet, 1858 August 9
mdRecord.dcterms:creator: Little, Abba Isabella Chamberlain, 1816-1893
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Letter from Abba Little, Vice Regent for Maine, to Susan Pellet, secretary, August 9, 1858. Portland. Has her instructions re "resuming reports of Assn", cannot comply with Regent's request because of pressure of her own business, hopes to make full report in October. Organizing Maine has been slow, started only recently but has reached every county and many towns. Needs pictures for sale, and for exhibition.
